name: Droplets (OrelD)
description:
This numeric toy is an imitation of the "Bloom" Iphone app, made by Brian Eno.  As you can see I didn't invent anything and all credit for the original idea goes to Brian Eno. But I consider this app as a training : this is the first programming project I achieve on my own :)

How to play : left clic on yellow rectangle.
